title: Music is Sweet

abstract: Share the joy of music with these amazing young voices from Poowong Consolidated School. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from South Gippsland'.
description: Share the joy of music with these amazing young voices from Poowong Consolidated School. Meet the kids and teachers of this inspirational primary school where writing, recording and performing songs is taught hand-in-hand with all the other standard subjects. Students of all grades are given the opportunity to express themselves through music and to perform their songs infront of their peers and the community.
